query:
-- First check counts
SELECT 'total' as label, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM articles
UNION ALL
SELECT 'no_image' as label, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM articles WHERE featuredImage IS NULL OR featuredImage = ''
UNION ALL
SELECT 'with_image' as label, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM articles WHERE featuredImage IS NOT NULL AND featuredImage != '';
